mapper.select: SELECT fname, lname, email, streetno, streetname, city, state, zip, phone, password FROM RESTAURANT_CUSTOMER WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT_CUSTOMER (fname, lname, email, streetno, streetname, city, state, zip, phone, password) VALUES (#{FName},#{LName},#{Email},#{StreetNo},#{Street},#{City},#{State},#{Zip},#{Phone},#{Password})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUST_REVIEW (ReviewID, custEmail, RestID, ReviewTitle, ReviewDescr, ReviewDate, Rating) VALUES (#{ReviewID},#{custEmail},#{RestID},#{ReviewTitle},#{ReviewDescr},#{ReviewDate},#{Rating})
